description: Get the permission assignments for the specified Databricks account and Databricks workspace.

workspace_id.description: The workspace ID for the account.

principal.description: Information about the principal assigned to the workspace.

permissions.description: The permissions level of the principal.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.
